parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height for the dome in meters

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True if you want to reverse the dome direction, false if not

parameters.name: DoEllipticSurface
parameters.description: RUE if you want the dome to be an elliptical surface, false if not

title: IModelDoc2.InsertDome
signature:
void InsertDome( 
   System.Double
Height
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseDir
,
   System.Boolean
DoEllipticSurface
)

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Height for the dome in meters

parameters.name: ReverseDir
parameters.description: True if you want to reverse the dome direction, false if not

parameters.name: DoEllipticSurface
parameters.description: RUE if you want the dome to be an elliptical surface, false if not

remarks:
Before using this method, you must select the face for the dome using a selection mark of 1. See
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
.
